Papatoetoe jewellery store owner attacked with hammer and knife in violent armed robbery, police hunting offenders https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/person-seriously-injured-after-incident-at-south-auckland-jewellery-store/FBCFJYDVSVCO7AAWDGEDZC3WZM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/person-seriously-injured-after-incident-at-south-auckland-jewellery-store/FBCFJYDVSVCO7AAWDGEDZC3WZM/ The armed robbers fled the scene after the attack and are yet to be located. Sun, 23 Jun 2024 11:26:45 +0000 A jewellery store worker confronts armed robbers with a sword after they attacked the owner with a hammer today in Papatoetoe.

Armed robbers storm Mt Albert sports bar, hold knife to staff member’s throat, neighbour says https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/armed-robbers-storm-mt-albert-sports-bar-hold-knife-to-staff-members-throat-neighbour-says/VW2QD6D5M5CC5AUUTK7IEFGTFQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/armed-robbers-storm-mt-albert-sports-bar-hold-knife-to-staff-members-throat-neighbour-says/VW2QD6D5M5CC5AUUTK7IEFGTFQ/ Three people were injured, one critically, during last night's armed robbery. Sun, 23 Jun 2024 07:30:22 +0000 Three people were injured, one critically, after the attempted robbery of a sports bar in Mt Albert in Auckland.
Auckland bus attack: Justin Waipouri jailed for unprovoked stabbing of fellow passenger in Newmarket https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/auckland-bus-attack-justin-waipouri-jailed-for-unprovoked-stabbing-of-fellow-passenger-in-newmarket/CMCEBHOQXBE2HBOBVN2OTYWFVQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/auckland-bus-attack-justin-waipouri-jailed-for-unprovoked-stabbing-of-fellow-passenger-in-newmarket/CMCEBHOQXBE2HBOBVN2OTYWFVQ/ Craig Kapitan'I don’t know why the male attacked me. I was just trying to help him.' Sun, 23 Jun 2024 07:00:00 +0000 Auckland resident Justin Waipouri has been sentenced for a May 2022 stabbing in which he attacked a stranger on a bus in Newmarket. Photo / Hayden Woodward

Break-up legal claim: Woman seeks $27k over takeaways, car for man met on dating site https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woman-lodged-claim-for-27k-spent-on-takeaways-and-car-for-man-she-met-on-dating-website/E2FSTAUK5NAWPBYOSPVH2JGWPM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woman-lodged-claim-for-27k-spent-on-takeaways-and-car-for-man-she-met-on-dating-website/E2FSTAUK5NAWPBYOSPVH2JGWPM/ Tracy NealShe says he didn't pay her back for things like takeaways, medicine and a loan for a car. Northland power outage: Auckland Mayor Wayne Brown claims bolt removal led to pylon fall https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/northland-power-outage-auckland-mayor-wayne-brown-claims-bolt-removal-led-to-pylon-fall/UGV7BISX3BCFVIG53HERZV4GDI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/northland-power-outage-auckland-mayor-wayne-brown-claims-bolt-removal-led-to-pylon-fall/UGV7BISX3BCFVIG53HERZV4GDI/ 'I am making this assessment well before any official investigation,' Brown wrote.
